article.title: SRCTec to Build Army Counter Mortar Systems
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: SRCTec Inc. has been awarded a $15.4 million contract from the U.S. Army Communications and Electronics Command to build 14 Lightweight Counter Mortar Radar (V)3 systems and spares. The system automatically detects and locates enemy mortar positions by sensing incoming shells and backtracking their trajectory to their firing location.
